segments.text: Good morning , madam . I think I'm lost here . The place I want to go to is a hotel called the Hilton .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know in which area ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I am sorry I have no idea . I am a stranger here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Well , do you know anything near the hotel ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes . My friend told me the hotel was near the Central Railway Station .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then you'll have to take a bus and get off at the Central Railway Station .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you show me where the Central Railway Station is on this map ?
segments.speaker: S1
